question:
Match the columns:
List 1 List 2
Authors Books
A. Mahatma Gandhi 1. India Divided
B. Ram Manohar Lohia 2. India Wins Freedom
C. Dr. Rajendra Prasad 3. Hind Swaraj
D. Maulana Azad 4. The Wheel of History
     A B C D
explanation:
• Hind Swaraj or Indian Home Rule is a book written by Mohandas K. Gandhi in 1909. In it he expresses his views on Swaraj, modern civilization, mechanization etc.
• The Wheel of History was written by Ram Manohar Lohia.
• The author of India Divided was Rajendra Prasad. The book was published to argue against the partition.
• India Wins Freedom was written by Maulana Abul Kalam Azad.
